short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save your favorite products while browsing any of the WishLystIt-supported retailer websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly curate your wishlist of must-have fashion and home products as you explore the websites of your favorite retailers, all thanks to the official Wishlystit Chrome extension.

With the Wishlystit Chrome extension, saving products from any supported retailer's website has never been easier. Here's how it works: 

-- Simple to Use
While browsing a product you love, just click the Wishlystit extension icon to swiftly store all the product's details directly into your personal Wishlystit account.  

Your saved products are neatly organized in your wishlist, ready for you to revisit whenever you're ready to make a purchase or share them with friends and family, almost like creating a digital gift registry. View and share your wishlist from our website at Wishlystit.com.  

To get started, all you need is a Wishlystit account, which you can create in the extension or at Wishlystit.com.  Make your online shopping experience more enjoyable and efficient by installing the Wishlystit Chrome extension today!
